column5: Taking the family up camping near Huntsville this week starting Thursday. Was curious if anyone had any decent shore fishing spots in the area? On a side note, those that remember, Me and my boy caught a huge 6 pound bass last summer camping up in Parry Sound.Â Just got a call today that my replica is finally done from Advanced, picking it up Wednesday! Can't wait.
awesome! I hear their work is amazing
I am hoping you gonna share some replica pics. And few more from your trip.
